class_notes: Contact Bumyong Choi (bumyongchoi@emory.edu) for permission to enroll.
course_description: This course helps Korean advanced level learners to improve their proficiency to high-advanced level by introducting the language, history, culture, and society of Korea. Throughout the course, students will be broadly exposed to the diversity of Korean society and culture.
prerequisites: This course requires KRN 401 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2180, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: Y. CHO, Status: Open
